context: Amazon.com, Inc. is a e-commerce, cloud computing, and technology conglomerate focused on online retail, AWS cloud services, streaming, devices, and advertising. AWS market leader with 30%+ share. Echo and Alexa launched. Prime Video competing with Netflix.
